primary.context: Customer wanted to pay a balance of $1,484.81 via credit card.
primary.detail: The AI encountered a technical error while attempting to send the payment link and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Customer requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent performed identity verification (name and state).
Agent retrieved account balance and contract details.
Agent attempted to send payment link but encountered a system error.
Agent transferred the caller to the concierge queue.

failure.detail: The agent explicitly stated there was an issue sending the information before initiating a transfer.

clarifications.note: Agent asked for spelling of name.

actions.detail: Verified name and state for Paul Markowitz.
System error occurred during the send process.
Routed to concierge after technical failure.

insights.summary: The customer wanted to pay maintenance fees. The AI successfully verified the account and retrieved the balance, but failed to send the payment link due to a technical error and transferred the call.
insights.verbatim: It seems like there was an issue while sending your information. I will now transfer you to our concierge department.
insights.coaching: The agent performed well until the technical failure; ensure the 'send_payment_link' tool has robust error handling or retry logic before defaulting to transfer.
